languages.text: "Упаси меня Император пытаться вас подкупить, Ваше Звездное Сиятельство! Без единой задней мысли было... Простите великодушно!"

traits.locale_text: "Упаси меня Император пытаться вас подкупить, Ваше Звездное Сиятельство! Без единой задней мысли было... Простите великодушно!"
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"
languages.original_text: "Упаси меня Император пытаться вас подкупить, Ваше Звездное Сиятельство! Без единой задней мысли было... Простите великодушно!"

traits.locale_text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"
"Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"
"Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"
"Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"
"Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"

languages.text: "Der Imperator verhüte, dass ich versuche, Euch zu bestechen, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Mir ist noch nicht einmal der Gedanke gekommen ... Vergebt mir in Eurer Großmut!"
languages.original_text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator verhüte, dass ich versuche, Euch zu bestechen, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Mir ist noch nicht einmal der Gedanke gekommen ... Vergebt mir in Eurer Großmut!"

languages.text: « L'Empereur m'en est témoin, jamais je ne chercherais à vous acheter, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Cette pensée ne m'a même jamais effleuré... Pitié, je vous supplie de bien vouloir me pardonner ! »
languages.original_text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur m'en est témoin, jamais je ne chercherais à vous acheter, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Cette pensée ne m'a même jamais effleuré... Pitié, je vous supplie de bien vouloir me pardonner ! »

languages.text: “帝皇在上，我绝对没有贿赂您的打算，来自上界的大人！这种事情我连想都不敢想……求您大发慈悲，原谅我吧！”
languages.original_text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，我绝对没有贿赂您的打算，来自上界的大人！这种事情我连想都不敢想……求您大发慈悲，原谅我吧！”

languages.text: «¡Que el Emperador me lleve si intento sobornarl{mf|e|a}, Excelencia Celestial! La idea jamás se me pasó por la cabeza... ¡Tenga la bondad de perdonarme!».
languages.original_text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Emperador me lleve si intento sobornarl{mf|e|a}, Excelencia Celestial! La idea jamás se me pasó por la cabeza... ¡Tenga la bondad de perdonarme!».

languages.text: 「なんてこと…賄賂だなんて！そんなことはまるっきり思いつきもしませんでした…どうかお慈悲を、天の閣下！」
languages.original_text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"

traits.locale_text: 「なんてこと…賄賂だなんて！そんなことはまるっきり思いつきもしませんでした…どうかお慈悲を、天の閣下！」

languages.text: "Haşa! Bir kere zaten rüşveti İmparator yasaklamıştır Semavi Efendimiz! Aklımın ucundan bile geçmemişti... Lütfen bağışlayın beni!"
languages.original_text: "Emperor forfend that I try to bribe you, Your Celestial Highness! The thought never even occurred to me... Forgive me most graciously!"

traits.locale_text: "Haşa! Bir kere zaten rüşveti İmparator yasaklamıştır Semavi Efendimiz! Aklımın ucundan bile geçmemişti... Lütfen bağışlayın beni!"
